What is Simpleat?

Simpleat is made to provide the perfectly balanced diet with every nutrient your body needs for optimal health.

Simpleat will take care of your hunger while you have more important things to do whether it is your work, business, travel or simply having fun.

Why Simpleat?

Enjoy all the benefits of Simpleat

  • Complete nutrition

    One bottle of Simleat provides 20% of your daiyly needs for calories and micronutrients

  • Save time

    Spend your time on business, sport, work, family or fun. Simpleat will take care of your nutrition.

  • Save money

    Reasonable price for a complete, balanced and healthy meal.

  • Great health

    Simpleat helps your body to stay healthy and vibrant.

  • High energy

    No sugar spikes, only sustainable level of energy.

  • No hunger

    A bottle of Simpleat immediately saves you from hunger and satisfy your body needs.

Main ingredients

What is inside Simpleat?

  • Soybean protein

    Soy is a complete protein and rich in vitamins and minerals. Soybean protein provides all the essential amino acids in the amounts needed for human health.

  • Oils

    The perfect mix of lipids from sea algae, coconut, sunflower, flaxseed and canola. Rich with omega-3, unsaturated fatty acids DHA and EPA, which contribute to the normal function of the heart and brain function.

  • Oat flour

    Oat flour is made from whole oats and contains beta-glucans. This fiber have shown to lower risk factors for heart disease such as high cholesterol and high blood pressure.

  • Isomaltulose

    Isomaltulose is a natural occurring disaccharide. It keeps you energetic without the spikes of refined sugar.

  • Minerals & Vitamins

    A bottle of Simpleat contains 20% of daily requirements of all micronutrients for your body.
